name: three

scripts.test: npm run test-lint && npm run test-unit
scripts.lint-fix: eslint src --ext js --ext ts --fix && eslint examples/js examples/jsm --ext js --ext ts --ignore-pattern libs --fix
scripts.lint-examples: eslint examples/js examples/jsm --ext js --ext ts --ignore-pattern libs && tsc -p utils/build/tsconfig-examples.lint.json
scripts.test-lint: eslint src --ext js --ext ts && tsc -p utils/build/tsconfig.lint.json
